items.content_html: This project is a comprehensive and lightweight boilerplate for building Node.js applications using TypeScript. It comes with a pre-configured setup for Express.js, Docker, MongoDB, Redis, MinIO, and Maildev, along with robust security features and best practices for modern web development.
items.title: fless-lab/node-ts-starter: This project is a comprehensive and lightweight boilerplate for building Node.js applications using TypeScript. It comes with a pre-configured setup for Express.js, Docker, MongoDB, Redis, MinIO, and Maildev, along with robust security features and best practices for modern web development.

items.content_html: A lightweight Vue3 component to create dynamic blueprints for rooms, datacenters, racks, etc. Ships with TS types
items.title: graphieros/grid-plan: A lightweight Vue3 component to create dynamic blueprints for rooms, datacenters, racks, etc. Ships with TS types

items.content_html: Lightweight embedded database manager for NodeJS with advanced type inference and compile-time type checking. Written completely in TypeScript.
items.title: joelek/atlas: Lightweight embedded database manager for NodeJS with advanced type inference and compile-time type checking. Written completely in TypeScript.

items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.
items.title: testcontainers/testcontainers-node: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

items.content_html: Alternative to Netlify/Decap CMS. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, open source & free. Made with Svelte.
items.title: sveltia/sveltia-cms: Alternative to Netlify/Decap CMS. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, open source & free. Made with Svelte.

items.content_html: noUiSlider is a lightweight, ARIA-accessible JavaScript range slider with multi-touch and keyboard support. It is fully GPU animated: no reflows, so it is fast; even on older devices. It also fits wonderfully in responsive designs and has no dependencies.
items.title: leongersen/noUiSlider: noUiSlider is a lightweight, ARIA-accessible JavaScript range slider with multi-touch and keyboard support. It is fully GPU animated: no reflows, so it is fast; even on older devices. It also fits wonderfully in responsive designs and has no dependencies.
